code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{isAuthenticated}from"./index";var EmployeeRoutes=function EmployeeRoutes(_ref){var children=_ref.children;var navigate=useNavigate();if(!(isAuthenticated()&&isAuthenticated().user.role===1)){return navigate("/");}return children;};export default EmployeeRoutes;
